channel.title: Client Nulls?
channel.description: I made client a couple days ago and like some items are nulls, like for me Drag full helm and D boots are nulls how do I fix them?

item.title: Client Nulls?
item.dc:creator: @richcookerscape richcookerscape
item.description:
@richcookerscape wrote:

Dude go to help and support or the client questions board. This is the tutorials section.

Read full topic

item.title: Client Nulls?
item.dc:creator: @ztr_zac1 ztr zac
item.description:
@ztr_zac1 wrote:

The chances are, you have an invalid model id in your or, youre typing in the wrong item id in the pickup command. Try going to your class8.java, search “Dragon boots”. It should show abou 15 - 20 lines of code which set alot of anInts and other variables. At the top of this batch of code, it should say

[code]
if(i == ####){

[code]

the #### will be the item id for dragon boots.

This basically says, if the item id equals ####(d boot id) and then it sets the model ids, zoom, rotation, and other variables. Try doing pickup with that item id and also check the model number using a cache extractor and RSMV[/code][/code]

Read full topic
